QuestData.Title: Decommissioned Mission
QuestData.Description:
Ketya Shrediron,
Your new Iron Shredders are a menace to our own soldiers.
Decommission the prototype and store it out of the way until you've worked out the kinks.
I will send Engineer Trak to work on it in the meantime.
- Orgrim Doomhammer
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Engineer Trak and recover the Decommissioned Iron Shredder.
QuestData.RewardText: A prototype Iron Shredder, huh?! I bet we can get this thing working... they didn't have Thaelin Darkanvil to fix it!

Objectives.Objective: Decommissioned Iron Shredder Transported to Redemption Rise
